capstone.data

Class Representation

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.data.Representation

  • public class Representation
extends java.lang.Object
    A class encapsulating the information an element needs to be represented on the screen: a character, a background and a foreground color.

                      com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.Color background,

        Constructs a new Representation.
        Parameters:
        character - The character the element will be displayed as.
        background - The background color of the element.
        foreground - The foreground color (i.e. text color) of the element.
